The Strain is a high concept thriller that tells the story of Dr. Ephraim Goodweather, the head of the Center for Disease Control Canary Team in New York City. He and his team are called upon to investigate a mysterious viral outbreak with hallmarks of an ancient and evil strain of vampirism. As the strain spreads, Eph, his team, and an assembly of everyday New Yorkers, wage war for the fate of humanity itself. <<<<<<< HEAD 8.0 46 ======= 7.8 32 >>>>>>> 63a2c908009d8c5b86301c78fa0d8daee9faabf7 60 179638 The Strain Continuing 2013-12-26 18:25:50 10110 <<<<<<< HEAD graphical/276564-g10.jpg fanart/original/276564-16.jpg 1434806850 posters/276564-5.jpg ======= graphical/276564-g.jpg fanart/original/276564-16.jpg 1414703092 posters/276564-4.jpg >>>>>>> 63a2c908009d8c5b86301c78fa0d8daee9faabf7 0 SH01836850
